questions.question: What is the primary purpose of a spray dryer plant?

answers.c: To produce powder from a liquid feedstock

questions.question: Which of the following is a common application of spray drying?
What is the name of the device that atomizes the liquid feedstock in a spray dryer plant?
What is the purpose of the hot air stream in a spray dryer plant?

answers.b: To mix the powder with additives
answers.c: To evaporate the water content from the droplets
answers.d: To transport the powder to the collection system

questions.question: Which of the following is a common type of spray dryer design?
What is the name of the process by which the powder particles are separated from the air stream in a spray dryer plant?
What is the primary advantage of spray drying over other drying methods?

answers.c: Ability to produce a wide range of powder sizes

questions.question: Which of the following is a common issue in spray dryer plant operation?
What is the purpose of the powder collection system in a spray dryer plant?

answers.a: To store the powder in bulk
answers.b: To package the powder in bags or containers
answers.c: To separate the powder from the air stream
answers.d: To transport the powder to the next processing step

questions.question: Which of the following is a common safety concern in spray dryer plant operation?

answers.a: Fire hazards due to hot surfaces
answers.b: Explosion hazards due to dust accumulation
